noun.description: A person employed to test food or drink for quality by tasting it.
examples: experienced tasters can tell which plantation coffee beans are from

noun.description: A small quantity or brief experience of something, intended as a sample; a taste.
examples: the song is a taster for the band's new LP

origin: Late Middle English: in early use from Anglo-Norman French tastour, from Old French taster to taste; later from taste + -er.
